title: Proscribes conduct by a custodian wherein he or she threatens to injure or injures a member of a child's family
summary: Proscribes conduct by a custodian of a child wherein he or she threatens to injure or injures a member of a child's family, defining such conduct as endangering the welfare of a child, a class A misdemeanor.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to endangering the welfare of a child
